body.p: Use any of these to integrate Static Analysis Security Testing (SAST) and Software Composition Analysis (SCA) into your CI/CD pipelines:

ul.li: Synopsys Security Scan for Azure DevOps

body.p: With any of the integrations above you can:

ul.li: Scan when you merge code or on a pull request.
Optionally create pull request comments when new issues are found.
Optionally create a new pull request to automatically update vulnerable components.
